import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {Table,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions'; function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList=useSelector(state=>state.userList) const { loading,error,users } = userList useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listUsers) },[dispatch]) return (

USERS

{loading ?() :error ?({error}) :( {users.map(user=>( ))}
ID NAME EMAIL ADMIN
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email}
) }
) } export default UserListScreen
